headline: Johnson Controls International (NYSE:JCI) Integrates Workplace Solutions Amid 5% Price Dip
summary: Johnson Controls International (NYSE:JCI) saw its stock price advance by 1.49% over the last quarter, potentially fueled by its significant integration announcement with FM:Systems. The linkage of FM:Systems' FMS:Workplace with the Metasys building automation system was among the key developments, promoting efficiency in response times for equipment maintenance. This integration was accompanied by financial activities, including a dividend declaration and a robust Q1 2025 earnings report...

headline: Johnson Controls, FM:Systems aim for faster asset alarm response
summary: A new integration automates ticketing systems and consolidates key work order information across systems, helping operators improve maintenance resource utilization, the companies say.
